entities.name: arke alderton
entities.description: Arkie Alderton is described as a well-known broomstick designer. He is mentioned by name and his profession is specified.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is described as having a soft voice that can magically magnify her words so they are clearly heard over the man's screams.

entities.name: dementor
entities.description: Dementors are described as rotting, scabbed creatures with hands that can clutch and drag people away.

entities.name: mary cattermole
entities.description: Mary Cattermole is described as a small woman who is trembling from head to foot. Her appearance is specified in detail.

relationships.description: Arkie Alderton is detained by Umbridge, as evidenced by the Dementor's Kiss threat and his subsequent removal from the courtroom.
Mary Cattermole is presented to Umbridge in the courtroom, as evidenced by Umbridge's call for her name.
